description: Stretch one of your arms with the palm facing forward and pull the fingers upward for 10 seconds per hand.
Stretch your arm across your chest and pull it using the other arm for 10 seconds per arm.
Pull your neck to the right and to the left with the help of your hand, holding the position for a few seconds.
With both hands at the back of your head, bring it down, stretching the back region.
Cross your legs and bend down with hands stretched towards the floor. Repeat the movement with the other leg in front.
While sitting, spread your legs and try to touch the palms of your hands to the floor, repeat 3 times for 5 seconds each.
Pull your knee towards your chest and hold, switch legs after 10 seconds.
Sitting, cross one leg and lean your torso forward, switch legs after 10 seconds.
While sitting, close your eyes and cover them with the palms of your hands for 2 minutes, then open them normally.
In an open environment, look as far as you can in four directions for 3 seconds, moving only your eyes. Repeat 3 times.
Using your thumbs, massage the area below the eyebrows in circular motions for 15 seconds.
Standing, rotate your waist as far as you can to the left, hold for five seconds. Repeat to the right.
